mapper.insert: insert into M_NENTSUKI_SHU_KANRI (NENTSUKI, SHU, SHU_FROM, SHU_TO, TOROKU_DAY, KOUSHIN_DAY) values (#{nentsuki,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{shu,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{shuFrom,jdbcType=DATE}, #{shuTo,jdbcType=DATE}, #{torokuDay,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{koushinDay,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update M_NENTSUKI_SHU_KANRI set SHU_FROM = #{shuFrom,jdbcType=DATE}, SHU_TO = #{shuTo,jdbcType=DATE}, KOUSHIN_DAY = #{koushinDay,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} WHERE NENTSUKI = #{nentsuki,jdbcType=INTEGER} and SHU = #{shu,jdbcType=INTEGER}
